content.title: Blue Collar Rocket
content.description: I built this as a capstone project of my web development boot camp. Blue Collar Rocket is an React app to streamline processes in craftsmanship.

content.title: This Website
content.description: I developed this website with Gatsby and Tailwind as I wanted to learn more about the JAMstack. I like the concept of sharing knowledge and learning in public therefore I implemented a blog.

content.title: LIFE-AHEAD.ORG
content.description: This website is also a personal project. The goal of this project is to start a non-profit organization to help parents in grief. Therefore we already ran successfully a crowdfunding campaign. I develepod this website first in WordPress and migrated it later to Chimpify
